scripts.build:shared: npm run build --workspace=libs/shared-types && npm run build --workspace=libs/shared-validation && npm run build --workspace=libs/shared-constants
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=apps/frontend && npm run build --workspace=services/nodejs-service
scripts.dev:shared: npm run dev --workspace=libs/shared-types & npm run dev --workspace=libs/shared-validation
scripts.clean:shared: npm run clean --workspace=libs/shared-types && npm run clean --workspace=libs/shared-validation && npm run clean --workspace=libs/shared-constants
